movies.title: Doctor Mack
movies.plot: Since dropping out from the medical school, Lau Mack has been living a humble but contented life, running a small clinic in a shabby area, treating local inhabitants and poor prostitutes working there. One night, he escorts an injured gun robber to the government hospital, where he unexpectedly meets his old friend from college time, Dr. Jaw, now a reputed surgeon with an aspiration for senior management. To Jaw's bitter surprise, he finds himself outshone by Lau's medical talent and kindness to patients. Jaw is however determined to speed up his career ascent at the expense of Lau. His plots work perfectly, until an accident delivers his life to the mercy of Lau.
movies.simplePlot: Since dropping out from the medical school, Lau Mack has been living a humble but contented life, running a small clinic in a shabby area, treating local inhabitants and poor prostitutes ...

biography.bio: Tony Leung Chiu Wai was born in Hong Kong on 27 June 1962. He and his younger sister were raised by their mother after his father left them. In 1982, after passing the training courses of TVB, Tony became a TV actor and became famous for his comedy style in such TV shows as Lu ding ji (1983) or Jue dai shuang jiao (1979). However, he didn't limit himself to television and began showing his versatility in films like My Heart Is That Eternal Rose (1989) and La cité des douleurs (1989). After he starred in several movies directed by 'Kar wai Wong'; such as Chungking Express (1994) and Happy Together (1997), he gained more respect as an actor and finally received the Best Actor Award at the Cannes International Film Festival for his outstanding performance in In the Mood for Love (2000). In addition to his acting career, he is also known as a singer.
biography.name: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung

biography.bio: Ching Wan Lau was born on February 16, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Mad detective (2007), La vie sans principe (2011) and Black Mask (1996). He has been married to Amy Kwok since 1998.
biography.name: Ching Wan Lau

biography.bio: Gigi Leung was born on March 25, 1976 in Hong Kong as Leung Pei Chi. She is an actress, known for Turn Left, Turn Right (2003), Hitman (1998) and Tempting Heart (1999). She has been married to Sergio Crespo Gutes since October 3, 2011. They have one child.
biography.name: Gigi Leung

biography.bio: Christy Chung was born on September 19, 1970 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Samsara (2001), Le médaillon (2003) and The Defender (1994). She was previously married to Jon Yen and Glen Ross.
biography.name: Christy Chung

biography.bio: Jordan Chan was born on July 8, 1967 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Ip Man: Le combat final (2013), Trivisa (2016) and Big Bullet (1996). He has been married to Cherrie Ying since February 14, 2010. They have one child.
biography.name: Jordan Chan

biography.bio: Andy Chi-On Hui was born on August 12, 1967 in Hong Kong, China. He is an actor, known for Swallowtail Butterfly (1996), Koma (2004) and Give Them a Chance (2003). He is married to Sammi Cheng.
biography.name: Andy Chi-On Hui

biography.bio: Farini Cheung is an actress, known for Wan 9 zhao 5 (1994), Vengeance (2009) and Chi luo kuang ben (1993).
biography.name: Farini Cheung

biography.bio: Ying-Wah Cheung is an art director and actor, known for Seoul Raiders (2005), Lost and Found (1996) and Tom, Dick and Hairy (1993).
biography.name: Ying-Wah Cheung

biography.bio: Jing Chow is an actress, known for Armageddon (1997), Nan Jing de ji du (1995) and Lang man feng bao (1996).
biography.name: Jing Chow

biography.bio: Ji-Ngai Chu is an actor, known for Doctor Mack (1995) and Huan le shi guang (1995).
biography.name: Ji-Ngai Chu

biography.bio: Ying Hau is an actor, known for Beyond Hypothermia (1996) and Doctor Mack (1995).
biography.name: Ying Hau

biography.bio: Chi-Cheung Kwok is an actor, known for Doctor Mack (1995) and Huai hai zi ju le bu (1995).
biography.name: Chi-Cheung Kwok

biography.bio: Jerry Lamb was born on September 29, 1970 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996), Young and Dangerous 3 (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996). He has been married to Lily Hong since December 19, 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Jerry Lamb

biography.bio: Wang-Bok Lau is known for his work on Who's the Man, Who's the Woman (1997), Runaway Pistol (2002) and Miao jie huang hou (1990).
biography.name: Wang-Bok Lau

biography.bio: Yan-Leung Lau is an actor, known for Doctor Mack (1995), Bao zha ling (1995) and Zhen xiang (1995).
biography.name: Yan-Leung Lau
